weapons.name: Mistsplitter Reforged
weapons.description:
Mistsplitter's Edge
 Gain a 12~24% Elemental DMG Bonus for every element and receive the might of Mistsplitter's Emblem. At stack levels 1/2/3, Mistsplitter's Emblem provides a 8/16/28~16/32/56% Elemental DMG Bonus for the character's Elemental Type. The character will obtain 1 stack of Mistsplitter's Emblem in each of the following scenarios: Normal Attack deals Elemental DMG (stack lasts 5s), casting Elemental Burst (stack lasts 10s); Energy is less than 100% (stack disappears when Energy is full). Each stack's duration is calculated independently.

ascensionMaterial1.name: Coral Branch of a Distant Sea
Jeweled Branch of a Distant Sea
Jeweled Branch of a Distant Sea
Jade Branch of a Distant Sea
Jade Branch of a Distant Sea
Coral Branch of a Distant Sea

weapons.name: Aquila Favonia
weapons.description:
Falcon's Defiance
 ATK is increased by 20/25/30/35/40%. Triggers on taking DMG: the soul of the Falcon of the West awakens, holding the banner of the resistance aloft, regenerating HP equal to 100/115/130/145/160% of ATK and dealing 200/230/260/290/320% of ATK as DMG to surrounding enemies. This effect can only occur once every 15s.

weapons.name: Summit Shaper
weapons.description:
Golden Majesty
 Increases Shield Strength by 20~40%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 4~8% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

weapons.name: Skyward Blade
weapons.description:
Sky-Piercing Fang
 Crit Rate increased by 4~8%. Gains Skypiercing Might upon using Elemental Burst: Increases Movement SPD by 10%, increases ATK SPD by 10%, and Normal and Charged hits deal additional DMG equal to 20~40% of ATK. Skypiercing Might lasts for 12s.

weapons.name: Freedom-Sworn
weapons.description:
Revolutionary Chorale
 A part of the "Millennial Movement" that wanders amidst the winds. Increases DMG by 10~20%. When the character wielding this weapon triggers Elemental Reactions, they gain a Sigil of Rebellion. This effect can be triggered once every 0.5s and can be triggered even if said character is not on the field.
 When you possess 2 Sigils of Rebellion, all of them will be consumed and all nearby party members will obtain "Millennial Movement: Song of Resistance" for 12s. "Millennial Movement: Song of Resistance" increases Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attack DMG by 16~32% and increases ATK by 20~40%. Once this effect is triggered, you will not gain Sigils of Rebellion for 20s.
 Of the many effects of the "Millennial Movement," buffs of the same type will not stack.

weapons.name: Primordial Jade Cutter
weapons.description:
Protector's Virtue
 HP increased by 20~40%. Additionally, provides an ATK Bonus based on 1.2~2.4% of the wielder's Max HP.

weapons.name: The Flute
weapons.description:
Chord
 Normal or Charged Attacks grant a Harmonic on hits. Gaining 5 Harmonics triggers the power of music and deals 100~200% ATK DMG to surrounding enemies. Harmonics last up to 30s, and a maximum of 1 can be gained every 0.5s.

weapons.name: The Black Sword
weapons.description:
Justice
 Increases DMG dealt by Normal and Charged Attacks by 20~40%. Additionally, regenerates 60~100% of ATK as HP when Normal and Charged Attacks score a CRIT Hit. This effect can occur once every 5s.

weapons.name: The Alley Flash
weapons.description:
Itinerant Hero
 Increases DMG dealt by the character equipping this weapon by 12~24%. Taking DMG disables this effect for 5s.

weapons.name: Sword of Descension
weapons.description:
Descension
 Effective only on the following platform: "PlayStation Network"
 Hitting enemies with Normal or Charged Attacks grants a 50% chance to deal 200% ATK as DMG in a small AoE. This effect can only occur once every 10s. Additionally, if the Traveler equips the Sword of Descension, their ATK is increased by 66.

weapons.name: Sacrificial Sword
weapons.description:
Composed
 After dealing damage to an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 40~80% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 30~16s.

weapons.name: Royal Longsword
weapons.description:
Focus
 Upon dealing damage to an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 8~16%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all existing stacks.

weapons.name: Prototype Rancour
weapons.description:
Smashed Stone
 On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by 4~8% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.

weapons.name: Amenoma Kageuchi
weapons.description:
Iwakura Succession
 After casting an Elemental Skill, gain 1 Succession Seed. This effect can be triggered once every 5s. The Succession Seed lasts for 30s. Up to 3 Succession Seeds may exist simultaneously. After using an Elemental Burst, all Succession Seeds are consumed and after 2s, the character regenerates 6~12 Energy for each seed consumed.

weapons.name: Lion's Roar
weapons.description:
Bane of Fire and Thunder
 Increases DMG against enemies affected by Pyro or Electro by 20~36%.

weapons.name: Iron Sting
weapons.description:
Infusion Stinger
 Dealing Elemental DMG increases all DMG by 6~12% for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can only occur once every 1s.

weapons.name: Festering Desire
weapons.description:
Undying Admiration
 Increases Elemental Skill DMG by 16~32% and Elemental Skill CRIT Rate by 6~12%.

weapons.name: Favonius Sword
weapons.description:
Windfall
 CRIT hits have a 60~100% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12~6s.

weapons.name: Cinnabar Spindle
weapons.description:
Spotless Heart
 Elemental Skill DMG is increased by 40~80% of DEF. The effect will be triggered no more than once every 1.5s and will be cleared 0.1s after the Elemental Skill deals DMG.

weapons.name: Blackcliff Longsword
weapons.description:
Press the Advantage
 After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by 12~24% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

weapons.name: Harbinger of Dawn
weapons.description:
Vigorous
 When HP is above 90%, increases CRIT Rate by 14~28%.

weapons.name: Fillet Blade
weapons.description:
Gash
 On hit, has 50% chance to deal 240~400% ATK DMG to a single enemy. Can only occur once every 15~11s.

weapons.name: Skyrider Sword
weapons.description:
Determination
 Using an Elemental Burst grants a 12~24% increase in ATK and Movement SPD for 15s.

weapons.name: Dark Iron Sword
weapons.description:
Overloaded
 Upon causing an Overloaded, Superconduct, Electro-Charged, or an Electro-infused Swirl reaction, ATK is increased by 20~?% for 12s.

weapons.name: Cool Steel
weapons.description:
Bane of Water and Ice
 Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Cryo by 12~24%.

weapons.name: Traveler's Handy Sword
weapons.description:
Journey
 Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores 1~2% HP.

weapons.name: Wolf's Gravestone
weapons.description:
Wolfish Tracker
 Increases ATK by 20~40%. On hit, attacks against opponents with less than 30% HP increase all party members' ATK by 40~80% for 12s. Can only occur once every 30s.

weapons.name: Skyward Pride
weapons.description:
Sky-ripping Dragon Spine
 Increases all DMG by 8~16%. After using an Elemental Burst, Normal or Charged Attack, on hit, creates a vacuum blade that does 80~160% of ATK as DMG to opponents along its path. Lasts for 20s or 8 vacuum blades.

weapons.name: The Unforged
weapons.description:
Golden Majesty
 Increases Shield Strength by 20~40%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 4~8% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

weapons.name: Song of Broken Pines
weapons.description:
Rebel's Banner Hymn
 A part of the "Millennial Movement" that wanders amidst the winds. Increases ATK by 16~32%, and when Normal or Charged Attacks hit opponents, the character gains a Sigil of Whispers. This effect can be triggered once every 0.3s.
 When you possess four Sigils of Whispers, all of them will be consumed and all nearby party members will obtain the "Millennial Movement: Banner-Hymn" effect for 12s. "Millennial Movement: Banner-Hymn" increases Normal ATK SPD by 12~24% and increases ATK by 20~40%.
 Once this effect is triggered, you will not gain Sigils of Whispers for 20s. Of the many effects of the "Millennial Movement", buffs of the same type will not stack.

weapons.name: Redhorn Stonethresher
weapons.description:
Gokadaiou Otogibanashi
 DEF is increased by 28~56%. Normal and Charged Attack DMG is increased by 40~80% of DEF.

weapons.name: Akuoumaru
weapons.description:
Watatsumi Wavewalker
 For every point of the entire party's combined maximum Energy capacity, the Elemental Burst DMG of the character equipping this weapon is increased by 0.12~0.24%. A maximum of 40~80% increased Elemental Burst DMG can be achieved this way.

weapons.name: Royal Greatsword
weapons.description:
Focus
 Upon dealing damage to an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 8~16%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all existing stacks.

weapons.name: Whiteblind
weapons.description:
Infusion Blade
 On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by 6~12% for 6s. Max 4 stacks (24~48% total). Can only occur once every 0.5s.

weapons.name: The Bell
weapons.description:
Rebellious Guardian
 Taking DMG generates a shield which absorbs DMG up to 20~32% of max HP. This shield lasts for 10s or until broken, and can only be triggered once every 45s. While protected by a shield, the character gains 12~24% increased DMG.

weapons.name: Snow-Tombed Starsilver
weapons.description:
Frost Burial
 Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a 60~100% chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing 80~140% AoE ATK DMG. Opponents affected by Cryo are dealt 200~360% ATK DMG instead by the icicle. Can only occur once every 10s.

weapons.name: Favonius Greatsword
weapons.description:
Windfall
 CRIT hits have a 60~100% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12~6s.

weapons.name: Katsuragikiri Nagamasa
weapons.description:
Samurai Conduct
 Increases Elemental Skill DMG by 6~12%. After Elemental Skill hits an opponent, the character loses 3 Energy but regenerates 3~5 Energy every 2s for the next 6s. This effect can occur once every 10s. Can be triggered even when the character is not on the field.

weapons.name: Sacrificial Greatsword
weapons.description:
Composed
 After dealing damage to an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 40~80% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 30~16s.

weapons.name: Serpent Spine
weapons.description:
Wavesplitter
 Every 4s a character is on the field, they will deal 6~10% more DMG and take 3~2% more DMG. This effect has a maximum of 5 stacks and will not be reset if the character leaves the field, but will be reduced by 1 stack when the character takes DMG.

weapons.name: Blackcliff Slasher
weapons.description:
Press the Advantage
 After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by 12~24% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

weapons.name: Rainslasher
weapons.description:
Bane of Storm and Tide
 Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by 20~36%.

weapons.name: Prototype Archaic
weapons.description:
Crush
 On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to deal an additional 240~480% ATK DMG to opponents within a small AoE. Can only occur once every 15s.

weapons.name: Luxurious Sea-Lord
weapons.description:
Oceanic Victory
 Increases Elemental Burst DMG by 12~24%. When Elemental Burst hits opponents, there is a 100% chance of summoning a huge onrush of tuna that charges and deals 100~200% ATK as AoE DMG. This effect can occur once every 15s.

weapons.name: Lithic Blade
weapons.description:
Lithic Axiom - Unity
 For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains 7~11% ATK increase and 3~7% CRIT Rate increase. This effect stacks up to 4 times.

weapons.name: Skyrider Greatsword
weapons.description:
Courage
 On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK by 6~10% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.5s.

weapons.name: Debate Club
weapons.description:
Blunt Conclusion
 After using an Elemental Skill, Normal or Charged Attacks, on hit, deal an additional 60~120% ATK DMG in a small area. Effect lasts 15s. DMG can only occur once every 3s.

weapons.name: Bloodtainted Greatsword
weapons.description:
Bane of Fire and Thunder
 Increases DMG against opponents affected by Pyro or Electro by 12~24%.

weapons.name: White Iron Greatsword
weapons.description:
Cull the Weak
 Defeating an opponent restores 8~16% HP.

weapons.name: Ferrous Shadow
weapons.description:
Unbending
 When HP falls below 70~90%, increases Charged Attack DMG by 30~50%, and Charged Attacks become much harder to interrupt.

weapons.name: Engulfing Lightning
weapons.description:
Timeless Dream: Eternal Stove
 ATK increased by 28~56% of Energy Recharge over the base 100%. You can gain a maximum bonus of 80~120% ATK. Gain 30~50% Energy Recharge for 12s after using an Elemental Burst.

weapons.name: Skyward Spine
weapons.description:
Blackwing
 Increases CRIT Rate by 8~16% and increases Normal ATK SPD by 12%. Additionally, Normal and Charged Attacks hits on opponents have a 50% chance to trigger a vacuum blade that deals 40~100% of ATK as DMG in a small AoE. This effect can occur no more than once every 2s.

weapons.name: Primordial Jade Winged-Spear
weapons.description:
Eagle Spear of Justice
 On hit, increases ATK by 3.2~6.0% for 6s. Max 7 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s. While in possession of the maximum possible stacks, DMG dealt is increased by 12~24%.

weapons.name: Calamity Queller
weapons.description:
Extinguishing Precept
 Gain 12% All Elemental DMG Bonus. Obtain Consummation for 20s after using an Elemental Skill, causing ATK to increase by 3.2% per second. This ATK increase has a maximum of 6 stacks. When the character equipped with this weapon is not on the field, Consummation's ATK increase is doubled.

weapons.name: Staff of Homa
weapons.description:
Reckless
 Cinnabar HP increased by 20~40%. Additionally, provides an ATK Bonus based on 0.8~1.6% of the wielder's Max HP. When the wielder's HP is less than 50%, this ATK bonus is increased by an additional 1~1.8% of Max HP.

weapons.name: Vortex Vanquisher
weapons.description:
Golden Majesty
 Increases Shield Strength by 20~40%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 4~8% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

weapons.name: Prototype Starglitter
weapons.description:
Magic Affinity
 After using an Elemental Skill, increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by 8~16% for 12s. Max 2 stacks.

weapons.name: Lithic Spear
weapons.description:
Lithic Axiom - Unity
 For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains 7~11% ATK increase and a 3~7% CRIT Rate increase. This effect stacks up to 4 times.

weapons.name: Kitain Cross Spear
weapons.description:
Samurai Conduct
 Increases Elemental Skill DMG by 6~12%. After Elemental Skill hits an opponent, the character loses 3 Energy but regenerates 3~5 Energy every 2s for the next 6s. This effect can occur once every 10s. Can be triggered even when the character is not on the field.

weapons.name: "The Catch"
weapons.description:
Shanty
 Increases Elemental Burst DMG by 16~32% and Elemental Burst CRIT Rate by 6~12%.

weapons.name: Favonius Lance
weapons.description:
Windfall
 CRIT hits have a 60~100% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12~6s.

weapons.name: Dragonspine Spear
weapons.description:
Frost Burial
 Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a 60~100% chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing 80~140% AoE ATK DMG. Opponents affected by Cryo are dealt 200~360% ATK DMG instead by the icicle. Can only occur once every 10s.

weapons.name: Dragon's Bane
weapons.description:
Bane of Flame and Water
 Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by 20~36%.

weapons.name: Deathmatch
weapons.description:
Gladiator
 If there are at least 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by 16~32% and DEF is increased by 16~32%. If there are fewer than 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by 24~48%.

weapons.name: Crescent Pike
weapons.description:
Infusion Needle
 After picking up an Elemental Orb/Particle, Normal and Charged Attacks deal an additional 20~40% ATK as DMG for 5s.

weapons.name: Blackcliff Pole
weapons.description:
Press the Advantage
 After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by 12~24% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

weapons.name: Wavebreaker's Fin
weapons.description:
Watatsumi Wavewalker
 For every point of the entire party's combined maximum Energy capacity, the Elemental Burst DMG of the character equipping this weapon is increased by 0.12~0.24%. A maximum of 40~80% increased Elemental Burst DMG can be achieved this way.

weapons.name: Royal Spear
weapons.description:
Focus
 Upon dealing damage to an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 8~16%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all existing stacks.

weapons.name: White Tassel
weapons.description:
Sharp
 Increases Normal Attack DMG by 24~48%.

weapons.name: Black Tassel
weapons.description:
Bane of the Soft
 Increases DMG against slimes by 40~80%.

weapons.name: Halberd
weapons.description:
Heavy
 Normal Attacks deal an additional 160~320% DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

weapons.name: Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds
weapons.description:
Boundless Blessing
 Increases Movement SPD by 10%. When in battle, gain an 8~16% Elemental DMG Bonus every 4s. Max 4 stacks. Lasts until the character falls or leaves combat.

weapons.name: Skyward Atlas
weapons.description:
Wandering Clouds
 Increases Elemental DMG Bonus by 12~24%. Normal Attack hits have a 50% chance to earn the favor of the clouds. which actively seek out nearby opponents to attack for 15s, dealing 160~320% ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 30s.

weapons.name: Everlasting Moonglow
weapons.description:
Byakuya Kougetsu
 Healing Bonus increased by 10~20%, Normal Attack DMG is increased by 1~3.0% of the Max HP of the character equipping this weapon. For 12s after using an Elemental Burst, Normal Attacks that hit opponents will restore 0.6 Energy. Energy can be restored this way once every 0.1s.

weapons.name: Memory of Dust
weapons.description:
Golden Majesty
 Increases Shield Strength by 20~40%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 4~8% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

weapons.name: Wine and Song
weapons.description:
Ever-Changing
 Hitting an opponent with a Normal Attack decreases the Stamina consumption of Sprint or Alternate sprint by 14~22% for 5s. Additionally, using a Sprint or Alternate Sprint ability increases ATK by 20~40% for 5s.

weapons.name: The Widsith
weapons.description:
Debut
 When a character takes the field, they will gain a random theme song for 10s. This can only occur once every 30s. Recitative: ATK is increased by 60~120%. Aria: Increases all Elemental DMG by 48~96% Interlude: Elemental Mastery is increased by 240~480.

weapons.name: Solar Pearl
weapons.description:
Solar Shine
 Normal Attack hits increase Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by 20~40% for 6s. Likewise, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst hits increase Normal Attack DMG by 20~40% for 6s.

weapons.name: Sacrificial Fragments
weapons.description:
Composed
 After dealing damage to an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 40~80% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 30~16s.

weapons.name: Royal Grimoire
weapons.description:
Focus
 Upon dealing damage to an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 8~16%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all existing stacks.

weapons.name: Prototype Amber
weapons.description:
Gilding
 Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 4~6 Energy every 2s for 6s. All party members will regenerate 4~6% HP every 2s for this duration.

weapons.name: Mappa Mare
weapons.description:
Infusion Scroll
 Triggering an Elemental reaction grants a 8~16% Elemental DMG Bonus for 10s. Max 2 stacks.

weapons.name: Hakushin Ring
weapons.description:
Sakura Saiguu
 After the character equipped with this weapon triggers an Electro elemental reaction, nearby party members of an Elemental Type involved in the elemental reaction receive a 10~20% Elemental DMG Bonus for their element, lasting 6s. Elemental Bonuses gained in this way cannot be stacked.

weapons.name: Frostbearer
weapons.description:
Frost Burial
 Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a 60~100% chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing 80~140% AoE ATK DMG. Opponents affected by Cryo are dealt 200~360% ATK DMG instead by the icicle. Can only occur once every 10s.

weapons.name: Favonius Codex
weapons.description:
NoWindfall
 CRIT hits have a 60~100% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12~6s.ne

weapons.name: Eye of Perception
weapons.description:
Echo
 Normal and Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to fire a Bolt of Perception, dealing 240~360% ATK as DMG. This bolt can bounce between opponents a maximum of 4 times. This effect can occur once every 12~8s.

weapons.name: Dodoco Tales
weapons.description:
Dodoventure!
 Normal Attack hits on opponents increase Charged Attack DMG by 16~32% for 6s Charged Attack hits on opponents increase ATK by 8~16% for 6s.

weapons.name: Blackcliff Agate
weapons.description:
Press the Advantage
 After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by 12~24% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

weapons.name: Magic Guide
weapons.description:
Bane of Storm and Tide
 Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by 12~24%.

weapons.name: Otherworldly Story
weapons.description:
Energy Shower
 Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores 1~2% HP.

weapons.name: Emerald Orb
weapons.description:
Rapids
 Upon causing a Vaporize, Electro-Charged, Frozen, or a Hydro-infused Swirl reaction, increases ATK by 20~40% for 12s.

weapons.name: Thrilling Tales of Dragon Slayers
weapons.description:
Heritage
 When switching characters, the new character taking the field has their ATK increased by 24~48% for 10s. This effect can only occur once every 20s.

weapons.name: Twin Nephrite
weapons.description:
Guerilla Tactic
 Defeating an opponent increases Movement SPD and ATK by 12~20% for 15s.

weapons.name: Polar Star
weapons.description:
Daylight's Augury
 Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG increased by 12~24%. After a Normal Attack, Charged Attack, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst hits an opponent, 1 stack of Ashen Nightstar will be gained for 12s. When 1/2/3/4 stacks of Ashen Nightstar are present, ATK is increased by 10/20/30/48~20/40/60/96%. The stack of Ashen Nightstar created by the Normal Attack, Charged Attack, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst will be counted independently of the others.

weapons.name: Thundering Pulse
weapons.description:
Rule By Thunder
 Increases ATK by 20~40% and grants the might of the Thunder Emblem. At stack levels 1/2/3, the Thunder Emblem increases Normal Attack DMG by 12/24/40~24/48/80%. The character will obtain 1 stack of Thunder Emblem in each of the following scenarios: Normal Attack deals DMG (stack lasts 5s), casting Elemental Skill (stack lasts 10s); Energy is less than 100% (stack disappears when Energy is full). Each stack's duration is calculated independently.

weapons.name: Elegy for the End
weapons.description:
The Parting Refrain
 A part of the "Millennial Movement" that wanders amidst the winds. Increases Elemental Mastery by 60~120. When the Elemental Skills or Elemental Bursts of the character wielding this weapon hit opponents, that character gains a Sigil of Remembrance. This effect can be triggered once every 0.2s and can be triggered even if said character is not on the field. When you possess 4 Sigils of Remembrance, all of them will be consumed and all nearby party members will obtain the "Millennial Movement: Farewell Song" effect for 12s. "Millennial Movement: Farewell Song" increases Elemental Mastery by 100~200 and increases ATK by 20~40%. Once this effect is triggered, you will not gain Sigils of Remembrance for 20s. Of the many effects of the "Millennial Movement," buffs of the same type will not stack.

weapons.name: Skyward Harp
weapons.description:
Echoing Ballad
 Increases CRIT DMG by 20~40%. Hits have a 60~100% chance to inflict a small AoE attack, dealing 125% Physical ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 4~2s.

weapons.name: Amos' Bow
weapons.description:
Strong-Willed
 Increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 12~24%. After a Normal or Charged Attack is fired, DMG dealt increases by a further 8~16% every 0.1 seconds the arrow is in the air for up to 5 times.

weapons.name: Alley Hunter
weapons.description:
Oppidan Ambush
 While the character equipped with this weapon is in the party but not on the field, their DMG increases by 2~4% every second up to a max of 20~40%. When the character is on the field for more than 4s, the aforementioned DMG buff decreases by 4~8% per second until it reaches 0%.

weapons.name: The Viridescent Hunt
weapons.description:
Verdant Wind
 Upon hit, Normal and Aimed Shot Attacks have a 50% chance to generate a Cyclone, which will continuously attract surrounding opponents, dealing 40~80% of ATK as DMG to these opponents every 0.5s for 4s. This effect can only occur once every 14~10s.

weapons.name: The Stringless
weapons.description:
Arrowless Song
 Increases Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by 24~48%.

weapons.name: Sacrificial Bow
weapons.description:
Composed
 After dealing damage to an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 40~80% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 30~16s.

weapons.name: Rust
weapons.description:
Rapid Firing
 Increases Normal Attack DMG by 40~80% but decreases Charged Attack DMG by 10%.

weapons.name: Royal Bow
weapons.description:
Focus
 Upon dealing damage to an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 8~16%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all existing stacks.

weapons.name: Predator
weapons.description:
Strong Strike
 Effective only on the following platform: "PlayStation Network" 
Dealing Cryo DMG to opponents increases this character's Normal and Charged Attack DMG by 10% for 6s. This effect can have a maximum of 2 stacks. Additionally, when Aloy equips Predator, ATK is increased by 66.

weapons.name: Prototype Crescent
weapons.description:
Unreturning
 Charged Attack hits on weak points increase Movement SPD by 10% and ATK by 36~72% for 10s.

weapons.name: Mouun's Moon
weapons.description:
Watatsumi Wavewalker
 For every point of the entire party's combined maximum Energy capacity, the Elemental Burst DMG of the character equipping this weapon is increased by 0.12~0.24%. A maximum of 40~80% increased Elemental Burst DMG can be achieved this way.

weapons.name: Mitternachts Waltz
weapons.description:
Evernight Duet
 Normal Attack hits on opponents increase Elemental Skill DMG by 20~40% for 5s. Elemental Skill hits on opponents increase Normal Attack DMG by 20~40% for 5s.

weapons.name: Hamayumi
weapons.description:
Full Draw
 Increases Normal Attack DMG by 16~32% and Charged Attack DMG by 12~24%. When the equipping character's Energy reaches 100%, this effect is increased by 100%.

weapons.name: Favonius Warbow
weapons.description:
Windfall
 CRIT hits have a 60~100% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12~6s.

weapons.name: Compound Bow
weapons.description:
Infusion Arrow
 Normal Attack and Charged Attack hits increase ATK by 4~8% and Normal ATK SPD by 1.2~2.4% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.

weapons.name: Blackcliff Warbow
weapons.description:
Press the Advantage
 After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by 12~24% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

weapons.name: Windblume Ode
weapons.description:
Windblume Wish
 After using an Elemental Skill, receive a boon from the ancient wish of the Windblume, increasing ATK by 16~32% for 6s.

weapons.name: Raven Bow
weapons.description:
Bane of Flame and Water
 Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by 12~24%.

weapons.name: Recurve Bow
weapons.description:
Cull the Weak
 Defeating an opponent restores 8~16% HP.

weapons.name: Messenger
weapons.description:
Archer's Message
 Charged Attack hits on weak spots deal an additional 100~200% ATK DMG as CRIT DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

weapons.name: Sharpshooter's Oath
weapons.description:
Precise
 Increases DMG against weak spots by 24~48%.

weapons.name: Slingshot
weapons.description:
Slingshot
 If a Normal or Charged Attack hits a target within 0.3s of being fired, increases DMG by 36~60%. Otherwise, decreases DMG by 10%.
